job.title: Data Modeler
job.description: Description:The EBDM Model Developer/ Analyst will function as part of the EBDM Model Development team. The role will primarily facilitate ongoing model validation efforts including, but not limited to: writing and executing model code; training, testing and validation of model performance against benchmark methods; data quality assessment; implementation of data preprocessing methods; reproducible workflow design; and documentation of methods, assumptions and outcomes. Analytical focus will provide insights into business processes, derived from model applications and involve communication of technical procedures to a wide audience with varying backgrounds.Required Job Skills:â¢ Proficiency in Python programming and object oriented designâ¢ Practical experience with large data analysis with multiple open source programming libraries (pandas, numpy, scikit-learn, scipy, statsmodels, as well as one of tensorflow/keras/pytorch)â¢ Hadoop, Apache Sparkâ¢ Neo4j and Cypherâ¢ General statistics and probabilityâ¢ Time series analysis, forecasting and anomaly detectionâ¢ Graph analytics/ network scienceâ¢ Hands on advanced statistical modeling and/or machine learning model development in Pythonâ¢ Experience with model design, implementation and evaluation of model performanceâ¢ Model validation procedures with knowledge of regulatory requirements in industryâ¢ Quick learner with capacity for independent judgment and decision makingâ¢ Advanced ExcelDesired Job Skills:â¢ Effective written and oral communication skills, especially in reference to explaining quantitative methodology for audiences of all technical backgroundsâ¢ Degree in quantitative discipline involving computer science, engineering or statisticsâ¢ Jira/Agileâ¢ PowerPointâ¢ SharePoint
